p: First, 0.1 g cheese fat was weighed into a 250‐ml flask and 25 ml acetic acid/chloroform (ratio of 3:2, v/v) was poured. Then, the mixture was stirred up to complete dissolution of remained lipids. After potassium iodide (1 ml) addition, the solution was maintained in a dark room for 10 min. Distilled water (20 ml) was poured and titrated with sodium thiosulfate, with 1.5% starch as an indicator. The peroxide value was represented as meq peroxide/kg cheese sample (Shin et al., 2012).
